configure2.testIfWorking: Use your remote or the switch above to test your device

pair.imitate: Press the on button on your remote
pair.imitateOn: Press and hold the on button on your remote until a checkmark appears (±8 seconds)
pair.imitateOff: Press and hold the off button on your remote until a checkmark appears (±8 seconds)

imitate2.testIfWorking: Use your remote or the switch above to test your device

generate1.pressprogram: Press and hold the program button on your device untill the red led starts to blink

generate2.testIfWorking: Use the switch above to test your device
